metadata.title: USN-5571-1 -- PostgreSQL vulnerability
metadata.description: Sven Klemm discovered that PostgreSQL incorrectly handled extensions. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code when extensions are created or updated.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5571-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  postgresql-server-dev-14 - 14.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 libecpg6 - 14.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 libpq-dev - 14.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 postgresql-pltcl-14 - 14.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 libpgtypes3 - 14.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 postgresql-plpython3-14 - 14.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 libecpg-dev - 14.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 postgresql-14 - 14.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 postgresql-plperl-14 - 14.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 libpq5 - 14.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 postgresql-client-14 - 14.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 postgresql-doc-14 - 14.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 libecpg-compat3 - 14.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 No subscription required
